About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Data Science Enthusiast with interest leaning towards NLP and Deep learning. A dedicated learner with a strong foundation in Python, SQL and data visualization and strong motivation to learning new technologies in the field of Machine Learning and Deep Learning ready to tackle complex challenges and deliver actionable insights to drive business growth.

Deloitte

Associate QA Engineer: July 2018 - Sep 2019

Lead the development of performance tests using locust and jmeter. Developed python scripts to validate data in crystal reports and reduced manual effort of business analysts before release.

Moody's Analytics

Associate QA Engineer: Oct 2019 - present

Performed EDA on logs generated by jmeter to identify performance bottlenecks in Stored procedures. Developed a dashboard for the same using Django and altair to show weekly performance test results. Developed the ability in the automation framework to perform localization in runtime and eliminated manual effort for the same. Introduced parallelization using selenium grid in the automation framework and reduced execution time by 20%.
